snippet: The Transportation Security Administration says two men have been charged after trying to bring loaded guns onto planes at a North Carolina airport....

headline.main: 2 Charged With Trying to Bring Loaded Guns Onto Planes
headline.print_headline: 2 Charged With Trying to Bring Loaded Guns Onto Planes

lead_paragraph: The Transportation Security Administration says two men have been charged after trying to bring loaded guns onto planes at a North Carolina airport.
